text: "Addicted to You" is a track by Swedish DJ Avicii, featuring Audra Mae. It was released on November 27, 2013, as part of his album True. The song captures the intense emotions of love, likening it to an addiction, where the narrator feels overwhelmed and unable to imagine life without their partner. Musically, it blends dance and folk elements, driven by a prominent guitar and soft dynamics that build to a climax. The music video was inspired by Bonnie and Clyde. It shows a passionate yet tragic love story set in the 1930s. The song achieved commercial success. It earned multiple certifications worldwide. ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Avicii songs
title: Addicted to You (Avicii song)
